body: Which java version is best for playing MC on, please respond ASAP.
body_tagged: Which java version is best for playing MC on, please respond ASAP.
title: Java for MC?

replies.body: Theres really no best java. Just keep it updated and you should be fine
replies.body_tagged: Theres really no best java. Just keep it updated and you should be fine

replies.body:
If you have a 32bit operating system use java 32 bit

If you have a 64but operating systen, HIGHLY recommended to use java 64 bit
